charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Shauntal
while strolling through town, but Shauntal
did not seem to notice [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_020:
“The bond between them was deeper than
the darkest abyss. It would outlast eternity,
continuing without pause, forevermore...”
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_030: Ahh, this place makes me feel so inspired!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_070:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?! G-gosh, I’m sorry!
I must have been spacing out.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_090:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?! G-gosh, I’m sorry!
I must have been spacing out.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_110:
I suppose so. I’m in the middle of writing
a novel, you see...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_120:
My imagination must have gotten the best
of me as I was gazing out at the beautiful
cityscape here.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_140: Yes, as a matter of fact!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_150:
I’m planning to write a novel
set on Pasio at some point!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_160:
There’s an abundance of unique
Trainers here on this island, after all...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_170:
I thought it would be interesting to
use them as models for my characters.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_180: For example, take that hiker over there.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_190:
He may have a big grin on his face now,
but what if he had a tragic past?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_200:
What if he ran into an old childhood friend
here on Pasio and the two of them had a
dramatic, tear-filled reunion? It’s possible!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_210:
Oh gosh! I’ve gone and let myself get
carried away by my imagination again.
I’m sorry...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0301_220: It’s OK. Don’t worry about it.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_230:
It’s just that...compared to my normal routine
as an Elite Four member, I’m positively
surrounded by other Trainers now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_240: It’s a constant source of inspiration.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_260:
I do. I believe that there’s a story behind
every person and Pokémon out there, and I
love to imagine what those stories might be.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_270:
But you know what?
The person that inspires me the most
is actually you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_280:
In fact, you remind me of the [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="hero" F="heroine" ] of
a story I read often when I was little.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_290:
Someday, I’d love to write a story about you.
With you as the main character, of course.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_310:
Perhaps it’s the way people and Pokémon
seem to be naturally drawn to you.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_320:
I think that we can all clearly see
how much you care about others.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_340:
I think you’d make a wonderful [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="hero" F="heroine" ]
in a storybook, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_350: Just like the one I idolized all those years ago!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_370:
It looks like Chandelure is the one spacing out
a bit now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0301_380: Is she bored with the book talk?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_390:
Not likely. She usually listens to me chatter
about books for much longer than this,
so I doubt it’s boredom...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_400:
I wonder... Maybe Chandelure wanted to
star in the novel, so she’s giving us the
cold shoulder now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_430:
Maybe Chandelure wanted to star in the novel,
so she’s giving us the cold shoulder now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_440:
Tee-hee! Don’t worry, Chandelure!
I’ve already got the perfect part for
you to play in the story.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_460:
We are indeed. Chandelure’s been by
my side since I was a little girl!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0302_470: Can you tell what she’s thinking?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_480:
With Chandelure, I can make a pretty good
guess at what she’s thinking by the flicker
of the flame on her head.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_490:
She’s always provided me with a soft, gentle
light to read and study by, ever since
she was a Litwick.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_500:
My very fondest memories come from
the times we’ve shared together.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_510:
So of course I’m going to include her
in my next novel! How could I not?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_520:
When the time comes to read that
book together, will you shine your light
on me like always, Chandelure?
